page.title: 10 May Day
page.content: On Friday 24th May 1985 it was May Day, and Emma Brown was the May Queen. "I had a crown with flowers on it and Mrs. Frend crowned me which means she put the crown on my head while I sat on the throne in front of the chapel in Latham's Hospital. We did some country dancing, first of all we danced the Circassian Circle, Buffalo Girls, then Buffalo Boys, Lucky Seven, and then Bridge of Athlone finishing with I Want To Be Near You and The Clap Dance (a Barnwell dance for every one based on the Pat A Cake Polka). Then the crowning of the May Queen and then I gave out bunches of flowers to the old people before we we back to school."
